name: WAGMI HUB
description: WAGMI HUB • A gamified platform where 9.3M+ users compete in meme battles, complete tasks, and grow squads. • MAU: 1M | Wallets: 1.7M | Telegram: 1.7M | X Followers: 861K WAGMI MEDIA • The go-to Web3-native media engine with 700K+ monthly listeners and the industry’s top AMAs. • Guests: Floki, NEAR, Gate, ai16z, ChainGPT, Trust Wallet, DOGS, ai16z, etc. • Campaigns: 400K+ downloads for Trust Wallet | 200K AMA listeners with Floki WAGMI AI • Copy trading, smart wallet analytics, and insights powering traders and communities • Real traction: 78% win rate, 2.7M users, 10K paid subscribers Meet the Team Mike Wang – CEO | AI strategist, ex-portfolio manager, IEEE AI reviewer Dean Simcock – COO | Ex-Ripple, Lamborghini, GameStop Paul Kay – CMO | 350k followers, scaled Trust Wallet, Catizen, Storm Trade, and more
